intro: Psychotria bullatifolia, commonly known as the "white psychotria," is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. Psychotria bullatifolia is also noted for its medicinal properties, with some traditional uses in local herbal remedies.
